20110117130933.000|20110117130935.000|CC1|ABOUT THE REASONS FOR HIS       
20110117130935.000|20110117130935.000|CC1|RETURN.                         
20110117130935.000|20110117130937.000|CC1|BUT HIS SUPPORTERS SAY POLITICS 
20110117130937.000|20110117130943.000|CC1|ARE NOT ON HIS AGENDA.          
20110117130943.000|20110117130945.000|CC1|>> MR. DUVALIER IS NOT IN THE   
20110117130945.000|20110117130946.000|CC1|POLITICAL RUNNING FROM WHAT I
